SiteNameAddress: Scott Road Garages, Scott Road, Kettering, NN16 9JY
PlanningHistory: At Planning Policy Committee on 05.09.17 it was agreed to designate this site as a draft housing allocation in the draft Part 2 Local plan for consultation with a potential yield of 25 dwellings. Potential housing allocation in Kettering Borough Council's Part 2 Local Plan.
SiteInformation: A sewer easement crosses the site.
Notes:
Previously assessed through SHLAA as site 705.

Council owned site. Preference would be for affordable housing on site.

Different dwelling capaciites have been calculated for the site dependent on potential densities to be applied (taking account of the surrounding area). These entail either 17 houses at 50dph or 12 houses at 35 dph and these values take account (exclude) an area of the site under which a sewer easement runs.

SiteNameAddress: Kettering Football Club, Rockingham Road, Kettering, NN16 9EU
OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority
PlanningHistory: At Planning Policy Committee on 05.09.17 it was agreed to designate this site as a draft housing allocation in the draft Part 2 Local plan for consultation with a potential yield of 88 dwellings. An application of Prior Nofication of Demolition has been received for the site, (ref. KET/2017/0761) and this has been since undertaken.
SiteInformation: Previously assessed through SHLAA as site 732.
Notes:
Privately owned site with a landowner keen to redevelop.

Former stadium of Kettering Town Football Club. Site has not been used for footballing purposes for a number of years. Stadium demolished in 2017.

SiteInformation: Previously assessed through SHLAA as site 1027

SiteNameAddress: Desborough Leisure Centre, Off Broadlands, Desborough, NN14 2YH
PlanningHistory:
Former Leisure Centre has been demolished. Site has been subject to an application for 304 dwellings (KET/2016/0044) albeit this was refused on 26/05/2016. An appeal has been lodged to this decision and is currently in progress ( APP/L2820/W/16/3162430).

Details are available here: http://www.kettering.gov.uk/planningApplication?thisWeek=0&appNumber=KET%2F2016%2F0044&submit=Go
SiteInformation: Previously assessed through SHLAA as site 1165.
Notes: Here it is assumed that development will only happen on the PDL element of site (and not the larger, wider site which includes extensive tracts of Greenfield). To derive these estimates it has been calculated that only 30% of the wider site is PDL so 70% of the overall site has been discounted for development.

SiteNameAddress: Rockingham Dene, Rockingham Road, Kettering, NN16 9JW
PlanningHistory:
Outline consent for 9 dwellings exists on the land adjacent to this site (KET/2015/0220) but BFR K30 itself has no extant permission.

Site was previously occupied by a Children's Care Home which closed in July 2002 and was demolished thereafter. 

Site was subject to a previous application for 28 dwellings (KET/2007/0990) which Committee resolved to grant permission for (subject to S.106) albeit this was never completed and the application was disposed of by the Council in September 2012.

Details are available here:  http://www.kettering.gov.uk/planningApplication?thisWeek=0&appNumber=KET%2F2013%2F0750&submit=Go
SiteInformation: Tree Preservation Orders exist on the site (TPO 2008 No6).
Notes:
See County Council map for additional details on features which may affect site:

http://maps.northamptonshire.gov.uk/
